messages.subject: Re: unschooling portfolio
messages.msgSnippet: I am in Rhode Island and fortunately, I do not have to hand in a portfolio.  From what I have been told by friends in other places, a portfolio is simply a few
messages.messageBody:
I am in Rhode Island and fortunately, I do not have to hand in a
portfolio. From what I have been told by friends in other places, a
portfolio is simply a few samples of what your child did in each
subject area.

--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, "laura"
<schoolathomekakkck@...> wrote:
>
> hi I am from west virginia and we need to have portfolios turned in by
> june 30 2008 to our school board I was wondering if anyone knew who to
> contact to do these portfolios we are new to unschooling as of feb 1
> 2008 please help
>
